name: Deap-supporter
description: a useful extension when you use Deap.

commands.title: Deap-supporter: load from current document for completion
Deap-supporter: load from selection for completion
Deap-supporter: reload from current document for completion

Deap-supporter.alwaysOverwrite.description: if true, overwrite the information of the already loaded class when loading created classes

Deap-supporter.neverShowSuccessfulInform.description: if true, do not show all messages except for ones to notify process failure.

Deap-supporter.createCallWay.description: the way to call create function. if you use deap.creator.create, you have to change this config into "deap.creator.create"

Deap-supporter.InstanceNameOfToolBox.description: the name of instance of deap.base.ToolBox. used to parse document.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
